name: SMEOracle
tag_list: jobs, job, recruitment, professional, it, sme, subject-matter-expert, recruiters, career-management, online-asset-management, content
overview:
SMEOracle, founded in 2007, is a site targeted toward professionals, Subject Matter Experts (SMEs) and Recruiters. SMEs visit SMEOracle.com and register under different types of available plans. This gives them an avenue to enhance their visibility, business networking and job searches. Likewise, when a recruiter registers and posts jobs, his/her visibility also increases and they can also access and view resumes of SMEs and endorse the SME they have worked witih in the past.

SMEOracle’s mission is to provide a single online career management and job recruitment solution for the active professional where networking, job searching, online asset management/sharing, content consumption, effective management of human capital supply, demand, and utilization of leading edge web technologies are most effectively leveraged for advancement.
